description.full_text:
Product:
Reinforced comfort core with fiberglass particles: improved comfort and stability
PUR + Matte varnish: natural look and easy to clean
Installation:
Exclusive Gerflor dovetails: easy to install and robust
Adhesive-free installation: installation in occupied area even in case of rolling traffic
Can be installed direct over ceramic (joint <5mm/<1mm)
Application:
Ideal for high-traffic areas (chain specialist, education, public buildings)
Environment:
Made in Europe / up to 55% recycled content / 100% reciklabilno: eco-responsible solution
TVOC <10µg/m3 / phthalate free: better indoor air quality
